ValidationRule.description: The contributor start and end dates must fall within the parent action's date range
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( amc__Start_Date__c > amc__End_Date__c, amc__End_Date__c > amc__Action__r.amc__End_Date__c, amc__End_Date__c < amc__Action__r.amc__Start_Date__c, amc__Start_Date__c > amc__Action__r.amc__End_Date__c, amc__Start_Date__c < amc__Action__r.amc__Start_Date__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The contributor start and end date must fall within the action's date range.
